      • addNetwork

        public int addNetwork​(java.lang.String ssid,
                      int security,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Add Wi-Fi network, only OPEN or WPA PSK network are supported.
        参数:
        ssid - SSID of the network
        security - Security of the network. 0-NONE, 1-WEP, 2-PSK
        password - Password of the network
        返回:
        result
